INSERT INTO st_daily_pay(CODE ,MERCHANT_NO,MERCHANT_NAME,PAY_TYPE,PAY_TYPE_NAME,PAY_MODE,PAY_AMOUNT,CREATE_DATE,ST_DATE)
SELECT CONCAT(pt.PAY_TYPE,t.PAY_MODE,#{stDate}) as `CODE`, t.MERCHANT_NO,t.MERCHANT_NAME,pt.PAY_TYPE,pt.PAY_TYPE_NAME,t.PAY_MODE,sum(pt.PAY_AMOUNT) as PAY_AMOUNT ,SYSDATE() as CREATE_DATE,#{stDate} as ST_DATE from bill_payment t JOIN bill_pay_type_detail pt on t.OPERATE_CODE=pt.OPERATE_CODE where t.`STATUS`='NORMAL' AND DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATE_DATE,'%Y%m%d') = #{stDate} AND CONCAT(pt.PAY_TYPE,t.PAY_MODE,#{stDate}) NOT in( SELECT l.`CODE` from st_daily_pay l where DATE_FORMAT(l.ST_DATE,'%Y%m%d') = #{stDate} ) GROUP BY t.MERCHANT_NO,pt.PAY_TYPE,t.PAY_MODE
